name: 1UP Marksman LT
description:
Jump and shot your way through 10 waves. Every 200 points the next wave comes and it's harder than the last one.

Shot all the ghost and jump over the ammunition wagon.

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.

Features:
-Resist 10 Waves
-360 degrees shooting gun
-Very addictive gameplay
-Suitable for all ages
-Easy to learn but hard to master
-Cool sounds and music
